name: Alien Standup
description:
You are an intrepid astronaut travelling the cosmos in search of new cultures and learnings.  You stumble across an alien planet with a love of comedy!  What will you do? What else is there to do besides immerse yourself in the culture?  Learn the alien language, break through language barriers and be the hero you were always meant to be!

If you love Mastermind and Cards Against Humanity, you may just enjoy Alien Standup!
